name: dmit2008-oa01-youngjaelee-assignment01
description: ### Initialize Project Folder to Use NPM  - on the command line run the following command. ```npm    npm init ```

scripts.init: npm run clean && npm run static
scripts.start: npm run init && npm run startparcel
scripts.build: npm run init &&  npm run buildparcel
scripts.startparcel-netflify: npm run startparcel && npm run static-netflify
scripts.buildparcel-netflify: npm run buildparcel && npm run static-netflify
scripts.start-netflify: npm run clean-netflify && npm run startparcel-netflify
scripts.build-netflify: npm run clean-netflify && npm run buildparcel-netflify
